item.title: Icelandair
item.description: Icelandair is the flag carrier of Iceland, headquartered at Keflavík International Airport in Iceland. It is part of the Icelandair Group and as of April 2018, operated scheduled services to 48 cities in 16 countries on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean out of its hub at Keflavík International Airport. The geographical position of Iceland is convenient for one-stop transatlantic flights, which is one pillar of the airline’s business strategy, along with traffic to and from the country.
